verses.verse: He who dwells<WH3427> in the shelter<WH5643> of the Most<WH9411> High<WH9411> Will abide<WH3885> in the shadow<WH6738> of the Almighty.<WH7706>
I will say<WH559> to the Lord,<WH3068> "My refuge<WH4268> and my fortress,<WH4686> My God,<WH430> in whom I trust!<WH982>"
For it is He who delivers<WH5337> you from the snare<WH6341> of the trapper,<WH3353> And from the deadly<WH1942> pestilence.<WH1698>
He will cover<WH5526> you with His pinions,<WH84> And under<WH8478> His wings<WH3671> you may seek<WH2620> refuge;<WH2620> His faithfulness<WH571> is a shield<WH6793> and bulwark.<WH5507>
You will not be afraid<WH3372> of the terror<WH6343> by night,<WH3915> Or of the arrow<WH2671> that flies<WH5774> by day;<WH3119>
Of the pestilence<WH1698> that stalks<WH1980> in darkness,<WH652> Or of the destruction<WH6986> that lays<WH7703> waste<WH7703> at noon.<WH6672>
A thousand<WH505> may fall<WH5307> at your side,<WH6654> And ten<WH7233> thousand<WH7233> at your right<WH3225> hand;<WH3225> [But] it shall not approach<WH5066> you.
You will only<WH7534> look<WH5027> on with your eyes,<WH5869> And see<WH7200> the recompense<WH8011> of the wicked.<WH7563>
For you have made<WH7760> the Lord,<WH3068> my refuge,<WH4268> [Even] the Most<WH9411> High,<WH9411> your dwelling<WH4583> place.<WH4583>
No<WH3808> evil<WH9567> will befall<WH579> you, Nor<WH3808> will any plague<WH5061> come<WH7126> near<WH7126> your tent.<WH168>
For He will give<WH6680> His angels<WH4397> charge<WH6680> concerning you, To guard<WH8104> you in all<WH3605> your ways.<WH1870>
They will bear<WH5375> you up in their hands,<WH3709> Lest<WH6435> you strike<WH5062> your foot<WH7272> against a stone.<WH68>
You will tread<WH1869> upon the lion<WH7826> and cobra,<WH6620> The young<WH3715> lion<WH3715> and the serpent<WH8577> you will trample<WH7429> down.<WH7429>
"Because<WH3588> he has loved<WH2836> Me, therefore I will deliver<WH6403> him; I will set<WH7682> him [securely] on high,<WH7682> because<WH3588> he has known<WH3045> My name.<WH8034>
"He will call<WH7121> upon Me, and I will answer<WH6030> him; I will be with him in trouble;<WH6869> I will rescue<WH2502> him, and honor<WH3513> him.
"With a long<WH753> life<WH3117> I will satisfy<WH7646> him, And let him behold<WH7200> My salvation.<WH3444>"
